name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Game of the Year Edition

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher 3 Wild Hunt GOTY/bin/x64/witcher3.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher 3 Wild Hunt GOTY/bin/x64/witcher3.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing Witcher 3
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
  pulse_latency: false
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
